content: dragon egg dice bag or ladies reticule yarn version this bag is crocheted with a solid background that won t allow dice or other small-ish items to fall out if you use worsted yarn and a size g hook it will be about 7 wide and 7 5 deep size will vary with other yarn or hook sizes suggested materials  worsted weight yarn  size g hook  stitch markers optional useful for marking ends of single_crochet row and vs  large-eye needle for weaving in ends  2 drawstrings* approx 16 each abbreviations used  st = stitch  slip_stitch = slip_stitch  chain = chain stitch  double_crochet = double chain stitch  half_double_crochet = half double chain stitch  space = space  decrease = double chain two stitches together see special stitches below special stitches  decrease = double chain two stitches together yo yarn over insert hook into 1st st yo pull loop through yo pull thread through first 2 loops on hook yo again insert hook into 2nd st yo pull loop through yo pull thread through first 2 loops on hook yo pull thread through the 3 remaining loops on hook a decrease counts as a single stitch  this pattern uses the crocodile stitch for the scales if you are having trouble understanding how to crochet the scales searching for a video on crocodile stitch will almost certainly help note that most videos will not include dcs between the vs in the row before the scales  this pattern refers to 2 dcs into the same stitch as a v pattern this pattern is made up of 3 types of row double chain double_crochet row provide the base for making the scales scale row are worked on top of the double_crochet row single chain single_crochet row handle the increases you need for increasing the number of scales in the next scales row beginning in r5 single_crochet row are
